merchantId.description: The unique identifier issued to you by your payment provider.

orderid.description: A unique identifier for this order to distinguish it from any other order you create.

transactionid.description: Unique identifier for this transaction to distinguish it from any other transaction on the order.

accountFunding.description: Additional details for account funding transactions.

purpose.description: Defines the purpose of the account funding payment.

recipient.description: Details about the recipient who will subsequently receive the funds.

account.description: Details about the account of recipient.

fundingMethod.description: If the recipient account type is an account with an associated card.

identifier.description: The account identifier for the payment recipient's account.

identifierType.description: Defines the type of the recipient's account identifier.

city.description: The city portion of the address.

country.description: The 3 letter ISO standard alpha country code of the address.

postCodeZip.description: The post code or zip code of the address.

stateProvinceCode.description: The second part of the ISO 3166-2 country subdivision code.

street.description: The first line of the address.

street2.description: The second line of the address.

country.description: The ISO 3166 three-letter country code of the issuer of the identification.

type.description: The type of identification provided for the recipient.

value.description: The identification value/number for the type of identification provided.

senderIsRecipient.description: Defines if the sender and recipient of the account funding payment are the same or not.

senderType.description: Defines if the sender is a person, a commercial organization, a non-profit organization or a government.

agreement.description: A commercial agreement you have with the payer.

amountVariability.description: Indicates if all the payments within the agreement use the same amount or if the amount differs between the payments.

customData.description: Additional information requested for the agreement.

expiryDate.description: Date at which your agreement with the payer to process payments expires.

id.description: Your identifier for the agreement you have with the payer.

maximumAmountPerPayment.description: The maximum amount for a single payment in the series.

minimumAmountPerPayment.description: The minimum amount for a single payment in the series.

minimumDaysBetweenPayments.description: The minimum number of days between payments agreed with the payer.

numberOfPayments.description: The number of merchant-initiated payments within the recurring payment agreement.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payments within the series.

retailer.description: For an installment agreement where the payer purchased goods and/or services from a retailer.

abbreviatedTradingName.description: Provide an abbreviation of the retailer's trading name.

merchantCategoryCode.description: A 4-digit code used to classify the retailer's business.

startDate.description: This is the effective start date for the payment agreement.

type.description: The type of commercial agreement that the payer has with you.

accountFunding.description: Additional details for account funding transactions.

purpose.description: Defines the purpose of the account funding payment.

recipient.description: Details about the recipient who will subsequently receive the funds.

account.description: Details about the account of recipient.

fundingMethod.description: If the recipient account type is an account with an associated card.

identifier.description: The account identifier for the payment recipient's account.

identifierType.description: Defines the type of the recipient's account identifier.

city.description: The city portion of the address.

country.description: The 3 letter ISO standard alpha country code of the address.

postCodeZip.description: The post code or zip code of the address.

stateProvinceCode.description: The second part of the ISO 3166-2 country subdivision code.

street.description: The first line of the address.

street2.description: The second line of the address.

country.description: The ISO 3166 three-letter country code of the issuer of the identification.

type.description: The type of identification provided for the recipient.

value.description: The identification value/number for the type of identification provided.

reference.description: A reference for this account funding transaction.

senderIsRecipient.description: Defines if the sender and recipient of the account funding payment are the same or not.

senderType.description: Defines if the sender is a person, a commercial organization, a non-profit organization or a government.

authorizationResponse.description: Information about the Authorization received from the acquirer or issuer.

authenticationFrameworkIndicator.description: Indicates whether transaction qualifies for processing under a digital authentication program.

authenticationTokenVerificationResultCod.description: The authentication token verification result code provided by the scheme.

autoExpiry.description: The date and time when the gateway considers the authorization obtained for the order to have expired.

avsCode.description: The acquirer AVS response code generated by the card issuing institution.

cardLevelIndicator.description: Indicates the card level result returned by the issuer.

cardSecurityCodePresenceIndicator.description: An Indicator, if a Card security code was provided for the Transaction.

commercialCard.description: Indicates if the card used is a commercial card.

date.description: The local date, in MMDD format, on which the transaction occurred.

financialNetworkCode.description: Indicates the code of the financial network that was used to process the transaction with the issuer.

financialNetworkDate.description: The date for the Authorization as returned by the scheme.

marketSpecificData.description: Indicates the market or the industry associated with the payment.

merchantAdviceCode.description: This field contains data returned by the issuer or card network to clearly communicate to merchants the reason for declining a MasterCard or Visa transaction.

paySvcData.description: Payment Service Data required in settlement request.

posData.description: Indicates the specific card information conditions for capture that are available when the card transaction occurs at point of service.

posEntryMode.description: The POS Entry Mode provided to Discover (JCB (US Domestic only), and Diners) for the authorization.

posEntryModeChanged.description: If the entry mode has changed, the Issuer will respond with the 1-byte POS Entry Mode Change (Y).

processingCode.description: Identifies the type of Card Transaction sent to Card Acceptor.

responseCode.description: The response code which indicates the status of the transaction.

responseMessage.description: Textual description of the acquirer response code for displaying on terminals.

returnAci.description: The ACI (Authorization Characteristics Indicator) returned by the issuer.

sourceReasonCode.description: The source reason code which identifies the source of the response code returned to the merchant.

stan.description: The System Trace Audit Number is assigned by a transaction originator to assist in identifying a Card Transaction.

time.description: The local time, in HHMMSS format, during which the transaction occurred.

timezone.description: The local time zone, in +hhmm or -hhmm format, in which the authorization was received from the acquirer, issuer or local terminal.

transactionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the transaction returned by the issuer.

transactionIntegrityClass.description: The Transaction Integrity Class (TIC) is an indicator defined by the scheme to evaluate the safety and security of the transaction.

validationCode.description: The validation code returned by the issuer.
